sentence.Network_en: She add a codicil to her will just before she die.
sentence.Network_cn: 她临终前在遗嘱上加了附录.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 遗嘱附录(Codicil)——对现有遗嘱的补充或修改。　　遗嘱执行人(Executor)——被授权管理或分配去世者财产的人。
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... intestate adj． 未留遗嘱的 | codicil n 遗嘱的附录，附加条款 inheritance n. 遗传,遗产.
法律术语_幻想_百度空间 ... will 遗嘱 codicil 遗嘱修改附录 heir,legatee 继承人.
财务词典(英汉对照) 1 ... Code number 标号数码 Codicil 遗嘱更改 C.O.D. sales 交货收款销售.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin codicillus, diminutive of codex, codic- (see codex)

entry.tran: (对所立遗嘱主要内容加以增补的)遗嘱附录
entry.def: A codicil is an instruction that is added to a will after the main part of it has been written.

means.word_mean: 1. a supplement to a will; a testamentary instrument intended to alter an already executed will

auth_sentence.content: Oedipa had been named also to execute the will in a codicil dated a year ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oedipa had been named also to execute the will in a codicil dated a year ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oedipa had been named also to execute the will in a codicil dated a year ago.

auth_sentence.content: It isn't hard or expensive to do the changes can be outlined in a codicil to the will.
auth_sentence.res_content: It isn't hard or expensive to do the changes can be outlined in a codicil to the will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It isn't hard or expensive to do the changes can be outlined in a codicil to the will.

auth_sentence.content: But as always there was a codicil, as the competition, Fletcher later claimed, was decidedly thin.
auth_sentence.res_content: But as always there was a codicil, as the competition, Fletcher later claimed, was decidedly thin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But as always there was a codicil, as the competition, Fletcher later claimed, was decidedly thin.

sentences.en: She add a codicil to her will just before she die.
sentences.cn: 她临终前在遗嘱上加了附录。

sentences.en: The content of a book or document exclusive of prefatory matter, codicils, indexes, or appendices.
sentences.cn: 正文除去序言、补遗、索引和附录的书或文献的主要部分。
